title: Chain is not syncing
body:
Hi,

Our geth client cannot sync blockchain. 
We have latest version installed from ppa repository (ubuntu 14.04, sudo apt-get upgrade ethereum).

It stopped syncing 2 days ago, no configurations of the server/firewall were changed.

Here are the logs:

I0112 16:28:55.281797    2094 downloader.go:252] Attempting synchronisation: 394a0c7719c53ecd, head [c78263ca…], TD 5444577416484936025
I0112 16:28:55.281915    2094 downloader.go:337] Synchronising with the network using: 394a0c7719c53ecd [eth/63]
I0112 16:28:55.281940    2094 downloader.go:905] Peer 394a0c7719c53ecd [blocks 0.00/s, receipts 0.00/s, states 0.00/s, lacking    0]: retrieving remote chain height
I0112 16:28:58.282559    2094 downloader.go:931] Peer 394a0c7719c53ecd [blocks 0.00/s, receipts 0.00/s, states 0.00/s, lacking    0]: head header timeout
I0112 16:28:58.283059    2094 downloader.go:339] Synchronisation terminated after 3.001120771s
I0112 16:28:58.283329    2094 downloader.go:263] Removing peer 394a0c7719c53ecd: timeout
I0112 16:28:58.283572    2094 downloader.go:240] Unregistering peer 394a0c7719c53ecd
I0112 16:29:21.743777    2094 downloader.go:228] Registering peer 394a0c7719c53ecd
I0112 16:29:25.281785    2094 downloader.go:252] Attempting synchronisation: 394a0c7719c53ecd, head [37120040…], TD 5444586120249946031
I0112 16:29:25.281894    2094 downloader.go:337] Synchronising with the network using: 394a0c7719c53ecd [eth/63]
I0112 16:29:25.281906    2094 downloader.go:905] Peer 394a0c7719c53ecd [blocks 0.00/s, receipts 0.00/s, states 0.00/s, lacking    0]: retrieving remote chain height
I0112 16:29:28.282184    2094 downloader.go:931] Peer 394a0c7719c53ecd [blocks 0.00/s, receipts 0.00/s, states 0.00/s, lacking    0]: head header timeout
I0112 16:29:28.282251    2094 downloader.go:339] Synchronisation terminated after 3.000346638s
I0112 16:29:28.282266    2094 downloader.go:263] Removing peer 394a0c7719c53ecd: timeout
I0112 16:29:28.282277    2094 downloader.go:240] Unregistering peer 394a0c7719c53ecd
I0112 16:29:53.878935    2094 downloader.go:228] Registering peer 394a0c7719c53ecd
I0112 16:29:55.281758    2094 downloader.go:252] Attempting synchronisation: 394a0c7719c53ecd, head [1b2cb8b3…], TD 5444603523528005838
I0112 16:29:55.282297    2094 downloader.go:337] Synchronising with the network using: 394a0c7719c53ecd [eth/63]
I0112 16:29:55.282577    2094 downloader.go:905] Peer 394a0c7719c53ecd [blocks 0.00/s, receipts 0.00/s, states 0.00/s, lacking    0]: retrieving remote chain height
I0112 16:29:58.283119    2094 downloader.go:931] Peer 394a0c7719c53ecd [blocks 0.00/s, receipts 0.00/s, states 0.00/s, lacking    0]: head header timeout
I0112 16:29:58.283185    2094 downloader.go:339] Synchronisation terminated after 3.000610513s
I0112 16:29:58.283205    2094 downloader.go:263] Removing peer 394a0c7719c53ecd: timeout
I0112 16:29:58.283220    2094 downloader.go:240] Unregistering peer 394a0c7719c53ecd
I0112 16:30:27.153672    2094 downloader.go:228] Registering peer 394a0c7719c53ecd
I0112 16:30:35.281817    2094 downloader.go:252] Attempting synchronisation: 394a0c7719c53ecd, head [4339ff5d…], TD 5444612231540825142
I0112 16:30:35.282395    2094 downloader.go:337] Synchronising with the network using: 394a0c7719c53ecd [eth/63]
I0112 16:30:35.282649    2094 downloader.go:905] Peer 394a0c7719c53ecd [blocks 0.00/s, receipts 0.00/s, states 0.00/s, lacking    0]: retrieving remote chain height
I0112 16:30:38.283629    2094 downloader.go:931] Peer 394a0c7719c53ecd [blocks 0.00/s, receipts 0.00/s, states 0.00/s, lacking    0]: head header timeout
I0112 16:30:38.284092    2094 downloader.go:339] Synchronisation terminated after 3.0014464s
I0112 16:30:38.284348    2094 downloader.go:263] Removing peer 394a0c7719c53ecd: timeout
I0112 16:30:38.284585    2094 downloader.go:240] Unregistering peer 394a0c7719c53ecd
It was an issue of the clock, sudo ntpdate -s time.nist.gov fixed it
